globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https: wss:; frame-src 'self' https:; object-src 'none';
